entry.title: Hello Python
entry.content: Welcome to BlueMonkey’s blog(https://github.com/msr12580)! This is my first blog, mainly about the problems I encountered in learning python, to share with the students like python, let’s make progress together, let the code into life. Python 环境搭建Python下载：Python官网：https://www.python.org/ Python文档下载地址：https://www.python.org/doc/ Python安装Window 平台安装 Python:打开浏览器访问https://www.python.org/downloads/windows/ 下载对应的版本 MAC 平台安装 Python:打开 WEB 浏览器访问https://www.python.org/downloads/windows/ Linux 平台可以使用以下命令安装：Ubuntu‘’’sudo apt-get install ipython‘’’ Centos‘’’yum install ipython‘’’ 环境变量配置 (这里只说一下windows，因为大多数初学者还是在windows上操作滴)在环境变量中添加Python目录：
